entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Wasm build hangs when using WasmEdge #85429
  • Strange permissions issue when calling dylib function from C# #85428
  • Update to System.Management 7.0.1 in .NET Standard 2.0 dll causes runtime binding failure in .NET Framework 4.8.1 app #85427
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(refPosition->refType == RefTypeUpperVectorRestore) || (genCountBits(candidates) == 1)' during 'LSRA build intervals' #85426
  • Add TestReadyToRun Leg to CI #85417
    Future
  • Can we have better doc on inner loop workflow for testing runtime changes in a BlazorWasm app? #85413
  • [QUIC] Application layer protocol negotiation error was encountered #85412
  • List.AddRange should go on interface. #85407
  • Add libSystem.Native libs to iOS/tvOS/Catalyst .framework #85397
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] An SSL error when sending request to server with self-signed certificate #85415
  • Expected to find either one or three in .../artifacts/packages/Release/Shipping/ #85394
    8.0.0
  • Runtime Fatal Error / Stack Overflow when using Static Abstract Interface DIMs with Structs #85386
  • Kill(entireProcessTree: true) - cannot terminate self (?) #85383
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Incorrect optimization prints `35514` instead of `28876` #85382
    8.0.0
  • iOS-net7 monoeg_g_logv_nofree crash #85379
  • ReversePInvoke transition should be no-op in `DoNotTriggerGc` region on NativeAOT #85377
    8.0.0
  • Metrics for System.Runtime #85372
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicListenerTests.AcceptConnectionAsync_ListenerDisposed_Throws #85371
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Assert failure: RawGetMethodTable() on linux-arm (LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests) #74895
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_fgBBcount == m_compiler->fgBBcount' in during 'Profile instrumentation' (Instrumented Tier0) #85061
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] Assertion failed 'replacements[firstIndex].Overlaps(offs, size)' during 'Physical promotion' #85403
    8.0.0
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Linux stress test builds are broken #85338
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Missing CompositeFormat features #85099
  • Function pointer type handles in shared code don't work #85240
    8.0.0
  • Explictily log working directory and let user know it will be used as content root path by default. #78789
    Future
  • Assert failure: (last_plug_size & (sizeof(PTR_PTR) - 1)) == 0 #76858
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent GC._Scenarios_LeakWheel_leakwheel_leakwheel test failure in CI #9615
    Future
  • `System.AccessViolationException` caused by combination of `AssemblyBuilder`, `GC.TryStartNoGCRegion`, and `GC.Collect` #82746
    8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Unable to find RazorClassLibrary.dll to be lazy loaded later. #85395
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Use Source Generators in default DependencyInjector #82679
  • Platform Specifications Should Match Casing Among All Build Scripts #81141
    8.0.0
  • [wasi][icu] bundle icu files into .wasm #82895
  • Profile Blazor WASM using Mono log profiler #72870
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] proper startup sequence in `dotnet.worker.js` #70891
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM CultureInfo names returns locale #84016
  • [Blazor] WASM GC #82974
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.InvokerCancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException test fails #83560
    8.0.0
  • JIT: mono llvmfullaot Linux arm64 release test failure #74125
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid result with negated op in compare on arm64 #85225
  • Func Performance #85302
  • Re-enable PGO optimization for linux #84711

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix #75581 #85430
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85425
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85423
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix createdump arg parsing for signal-based exceptions #85422
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Handle GT_RETFILT in fgInsertStmtNearEnd #85420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new SafeHandleMarshaller type to provide out-of-generator marshalling support. #85419
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6 #85418
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] GT_JMP implementation in codegen #85416
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Re-enable PGO for linux #85410
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [mono] Add back OP_XOP_OVR_X_X for arm64 #85409
    needs-area-label
  • [was] test sdk.pack in workload #85408
    NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: prefer edge counts; keep class profiles even if tossing counts #85406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Override Wasm SDK pack in workload testing #85405
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128.Create on Arm64 for mini JIT #85404
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Make some SystemNetSecurity properties public #85402
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add back OP_XOP_OVR_X_X for arm64 #85401
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [browser] Fix webcil lazy loading and satellite assemblies in Wasm SDK #85400
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Set lvSingleDef for non TYP_REF locals #85398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add ConstantExpected to PackedSimd.Shuffle #85390
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable AVX-512 for block unrollings (both copying and zeroing) #85389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Use the docker images with floating tags #85388
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][aot] Refactor deduplication to use enum instead of flags #85384
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • TarEntry: remove some unneeded checks when extracting symbolic and hard links. #85378
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Delete support for IAT indirecting base type/interfaces #85376
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Implements the emitter::emitDispIns. #85375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Ensure `maxSIMDStructBytes` doesn't report `compVerifyInstructionSetUnusable` #85370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: fix phase status for some minimal instrumentation cases #85411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix physical promotion scenario name and a couple of bugs #85343
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Change GTF_ICON_INITCLASS -> GTF_IND_INITCLASS #85396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix stress builds #85342
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add CompositeFormat.MinimumArgumentCount and remove TryParse #85348
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix generic dictionary lookups for param types and function pointers #85369
    area-System.Reflection
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Bump main preview version to 5 #85368
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix totalILArgs for explicithis #85347
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add introspection for readelf #85298
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Skip 84693 test #85381
    disabled-test, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84738
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • Re-enable PGO for linux #85355
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods on WASM. #82981
  • [NodeJS] Enable wasm exception handling for unit tests #85387
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Add metadata update for overrides (backport #85182) #85259
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.7
  • Make HelixPublishWithArcade Compliant With The TargetOS Lowercasing Policy #85357
    area-Infrastructure, Future
  • [browser] Fix webcil lazy loading and satellite assemblies in Wasm SDK #85335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.ConvertXX as intrinsic on arm64. #85163
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add Vector128.WithElement as intrinsic on arm64. #85158
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Fixup wildcard matching for runtime packs (take two) #85391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo14::EnumerateNonGCObjects #85100
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Introduce GT_JTEST and clean up GT_JCMP flags #85242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix simd12_t size #85362
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fixed regressions for `GT_NEG` containment #85230
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't re-scan previously visited blocks in helperexpansion.cpp #85201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging][native-library] If a dllimport is specified with an absolute path, look for it first #85271
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-mono, 6.0.18
  • [Wasm.Build.Tests] Fixup wildcard matching for runtime packs #85286
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Guard DynamicDependency processing against `TypeSystemException`s #85285
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Reduce calli address spilling #85349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added the ability to specify a Spin Count Unit via a GC Configuration to release/7.0 #84495
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [NativeAOT] Use 8.1 atomics, if available, in RhpCheckedXchg/RhpCheckedLockCmpXchg #85283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix/31527 invalid currentculture applying #85297
    area-System.ComponentModel, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception leaking from filter in nativeAOT #85366
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Store unhandled exception info on stack in Native AOT #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add Android BenchmarkDotNet test #85282
    area-Infrastructure
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #85254
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Generalize assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85323
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Use Wasm SDK in browser template #85311
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [browser] Exploring timeouts #85313
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove Base64 value length limit from Utf8JsonWriter #85334
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests for local aliasing on Mono Interpreter #85250
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use unique IL assembly names instead of automatic renaming #85185
    test-enhancement
  • Set BuildAsStandalone for gcstress test builds #85284
    test-enhancement
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, partner-impact

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get "Fatal error. System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory. This is often an indication that other memory is corrupt." in Blazor app with hot reload in .Net 7 #32084
  • Enum to numeric type implicit conversion #32083
  • I have problem with outputting .apk in MAUI #32064
  • Error while running dotnet build in a new test project #32061
  • System.Text.Json Serialize wrong result #32053

Closed

  • [SBRP] error CS0246 errors is generated TypeForwardAttributes #31250
    .NET 8.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable TestBaseTypeWithAmbiguousNonDefaultConstructorsRegression31655 #32091
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Switch format owner #32090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove msbuild properties that pointed to old versions #32089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • add more knobs to control upload chunk size, and if parallel upload s… #32080
    Area-Containers
  • Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32072
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the NETSDK1094 errors #32058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32009
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Add Nuget vulnerabilities output #32002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround malformed `typeof` statements in TypeForwardedToAttributes #32014
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Follow-up to #31559 #32047
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update dependabot to run on 4xx #31837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] include container tasks and targets directly to `Microsoft.NET.Publish.Sdk` #31432
    Area-Containers
  • updated containers docs #31884
    Area-Containers
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Bump FakeItEasy from 7.3.1 to 7.4.0 in /eng/dependabot #31987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A possible opportunity for optimization in ImmutableArrayExtensions.GetTypesFromMemberMap #67991
  • An opportunity for optimization in ImmutableArrayExtensions.CreateNameToMembersMap #67990
  • Hard crash and/or gold bars when editing a file that contains aliases to pointer types #67989
  • `void` keyword not recommended in "using unsafe" directive #67986
  • Unexpected recommendations after `unsafe` keyword in using declarations #67985
  • `unsafe` keyword is not recommended in using directives #67984
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicEncapsulateField.EncapsulateThroughLightbulbIncludingReferences #67981
  • CI test failure: Roslyn.VisualStudio.NewIntegrationTests.VisualBasic.BasicArgumentProvider.TabTabCompleteObjectEquals #67980
  • Assertion in NullableWalker.VisitConditionalOperatorCore failing in bootstrap build #67975

Closed

  • `unsafe` keyword should be marked as redundant if the using unsafe directive doesn't require it #67988
  • GeneratedCodeAnalysisFlagsMap is slow being segmented dictionary #67909
    17.7 P1
  • Stop deploying System.ValueTuple in Roslyn.VisualStudio.Setup.Dependencies #29705
    Compiler.Next
  • File-scoped IsExternalInit type is used in modreq for `init` accessors #67079
    C# 12.0
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Expose an optional FilterSpan public API on SyntaxTreeAnalysisContext and SemanticModelAnalysisContext #67257
    17.7
  • Remove locking from ProjectSystemProjectFactory (and use Workspace's lock instead). #67510

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid retaining memory while waiting for changes #67982
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid accessing DocData prior to document initialization #67978
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix conditional operator nullable walker assertion #67977
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Interceptors 3 #67971
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add interceptors open design questions #67970
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix CompletionResolve tests #67983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67969
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #67992
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Share common code involved into building dictionaries of members for namespace symbols #67933
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #67987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove ValueTuple workaround #67837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Call `PrimaryDependency` getter once in `PENamedTypeSymbol.GetUseSiteInfo` #67927
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Avoid rooting documents for languages that support syntax trees #67960
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Incremental Generators documentation fixes #67593
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67973
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't provide CodeActionWithDialog if option service is null #67951
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update configs for 17.7 p1 snap #67964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update features/interceptors from main #67966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Snap 17 7 #67968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove code lens cache to improve results returned #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67994
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part2) #67524
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE, 17.5 P3
  • Avoid stack overflow due to deep recursion on long chain of calls. #67913
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • EnC refactoring: Align wrappers with contracts better #67967
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing ref receiver temp #67955
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Feedback on caching constructed Nullable<T> types #67807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC refactoring: ProjectBaseline, ProjectDiagnostics, PendingUpdate #67941
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benign exception in `KestrelServerImpl.BindAsync` when running a default .NET 7 website on Azure App Service (linux) #47915
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #47912
  • Perf improvement: caching, caching #47911
  • IWebHostEnvironment does not return the appropriate physical path when debugging #47909
  • Benchmark and improve shared `RequestDelegateCreation` test infrastructure #47907
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor SSR form post handling: improve error handling consistency #47903
    .NET 8 Planning
  • CascadingModelBinder: remove the IsFixed parameter #47902
    8.0-preview5
  • [Question] How to find problem in our code leading to concurrent usage of HttpContext ? #47900
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #47899
  • Perf improvement: caching #47898
  • Simplify baseline tests for RDG #47897

Closed

  • [Blazor WSAM .NET 7.0] Visual Studio Debugger Cannot Attach to Microsoft Edge with Window Authentication Enabled #47913
  • Should AllowedHosts be in the template appsettings.json? #47862
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47891
  • how to run your Blazor project on IIS #47843
  • [Blazor] SetUpdatesAttributeName #47877
  • [QuickGrid] ColumnBase align check uses incorrect logical operator. #47857
    8.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] Router seems to be rendering twice #47058
    8.0-preview5
  • Honor default value provided in parameters for route handlers #47266
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #47892

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-preview4] RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47916
    area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add suppression message to JSON serialization #47910
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [blazor] Drop explicit change of extension of assembly to lazy load #47905
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4

Merged

  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • [GenerateEmbeddedResourcesManifest] handle Items with empty LogicalName #29306 #47887
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview5
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, 8.0-preview5
  • Add suppression message to JSON serialization #47908
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview5
  • Fixing wrong condition in QuickGrid column header rendering #47886
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Fixed Router renders component twice #47880
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Simple VB Group By clause throws #30773
  • Union/Concat throwing exception when using includes/joins #30771
  • Scaffold-DbContext command keep logging even when -Verbose parameter is not used #30770
  • Stop creating empty JsonScalarExpressions #30768
    MQ
  • Support for Azure Data Explorer (kusto/kql) #30766

Closed

  • Sub-optimal query generation against filtered base-typed DbSets in TPC schemas #30774
  • Should the valueconversion mapping for guard keys work with EF COre 6? #30772
  • Dependents not deleted when severed from parent in optional relationship even with Delete Behavior Configured #30752
  • Autogenerated ids are not populated to EntityEntry #30717
  • Which .NET core versions are required this package? #30703
  • error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'SqliteConnection' could not be found (are you missing a using directive or an assembly reference?) #30686
  • IN() list queries are not parameterized, causing increased SQL Server CPU usage #13617
    8.0.0
  • Map collections of primitive types to JSON column in relational database #29427
    8.0.0
  • Support querying over primitive collections #30426
    8.0.0
  • SQL Server: Allow users to explicitly specify the target SQL Server version/type #30163
    Backlog
  • Remove initial $ PathSegment from JsonScalarExpression/JsonQueryExpression #30747
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent delete behavior when clearing a list #30748

PullRequests

Created

  • Use JsonScalarExpression for primitive collection indexing #30769

Merged

  • Fix to #30575 - Multiple LeftJoins (GroupJoins) lead to GroupJoin Exception when the same where is used twice #30594
  • Add some VB.NET tests #30762
  • Refactor internal usage analyzer #30767
    auto-merge
  • Support primitive collections #30738
  • Remove leading $ from JSON expressions #30763
    auto-merge
  • Update branding to preview5 #30761

Updated

  • Allow configuration of the sentinel value that indicates a property has not been set #30760
  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
